definition: opportunity to live/to reprieve from death/life force/vitality
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: This, then, is the unique source of our strength as a health agency.
sentences.chinese: 那麼這就是做爲一個衛生機構我們獨特的力量來源。

sentences.english: Such a young and capable man as him will put new life into our work.
sentences.chinese: 像他這樣年輕有爲的人會給我們的工作注入新生機。

sentences.english: To the great vitality in the face of any challenge.
sentences.chinese: 以勃勃的生機面對任何的挑戰。

sentences.english: Only the patient has a slice of hope, doctor has the responsibility to save him.
sentences.chinese: 只要病人還有一息生機，醫生就有挽救。

sentences.english: The world is looking forward to seeing a dynamic and energetic UN.
sentences.chinese: 世界殷切期待一個充滿生機與活力的聯合國。

sentences.english: The flying waving in the wind, turn the illusive Buddhism country into the vigorous world.
sentences.chinese: 飄舞的飛天，將夢幻佛國變成生機的世界。

sentences.english: Used in garden landscape stone add vitality.
sentences.chinese: 在園林庭院內使用景觀石可增添生機活力。

sentences.english: Just because of that years of changes with each new, vitality abundant, a riot of color .
sentences.chinese: 只因爲那日新月異，生機盎然，色彩繽紛的歲月。

sentences.english: Buddha statue brings life to the stone remnants of Angkor Thom.
sentences.chinese: 佛像爲吳哥城的石頭遺蹟帶來了生機。

sentences.english: The flowers and hanging baskets were breathtaking.
sentences.chinese: 花朵和吊籃生機勃勃的長着。

sentences.english: National health agencies, Schecter added, need to step up with better oversight.
sentences.chinese: 阿德諾博士補充道，國家衛生機構需要加強監督。

sentences.english: it will be the time for China to demonstrate to the world the demeanor of its dramatic and dynamic new image.
sentences.chinese: 是中國展示它引人注目的和生機勃勃的新形象的時候。

sentences.english: In Shangba the river brings death not sustenance.
sentences.chinese: 河流給上壩帶來顛杌是生機，而是死亡。

sentences.english: Liven up a girlie night in with this fabulous Frog Prince Lighted Wine Stopper.
sentences.chinese: 奇異的青蛙王子低度葡萄酒瓶塞讓美女之夜煥發生機。

sentences.english: A wilderness, remote non-life, in the eyes of photographers is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 一片荒野，渺無生機，在攝影家的眼裏是美的。

sentences.english: Doctors are due to save a patient's life as long as he has a slim chance of survival.
sentences.chinese: 只要病人還有一息生機，醫生就有責任挽救。

definition: vivid/lively/(of food ingredients) live or fresh
